item.name: Above and Below: Desert Labyrinth and Underforest Encounter Book
Cleopatra and the Society of Architects
In the Year of the Dragon
Merchants of Magick: A Set a Watch Tale
Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization
Tribes of the Wind
item.comment:
The first impression: Just got this at Spiel 2022 and I love it - the art is excellent and the game is very easy to learn and understand, since everything makes sense thematically.
It has this interesting twist on player interaction, where the back of the cards other players have in hand affects which cards you can play. Aside from that it is a nice mid-weight euro with asymmetric player powers, where you are trying to achieve everything.
I couldn’t really say from the one game whether the asymmetric powers are balanced, but our game was pretty close.
The only thing downside would be it is one of those euros where I get so absorbed into the mechanics of the game that I don’t really have the time to appreciate the artwork and the theme that much while playing :-)
So far the highlight of Spiel for me, Thank you guys!
